model-deployment
****************


Description
===========

Model deployments are used by data scientists to perform predictions
from the model hosted on an HTTP server.


Available Commands
==================

* activate

* change-compartment

* create

* create-model-deployment-model-group-deployment-configuration-details

* deactivate

* delete

* get

* list

* update

* update-model-deployment-update-model-group-deployment-configuration-
  details
